sect1.title: Requesting a new plugin
sect1.para: If you think that a plugin for a website you know about would be a good addition to &app;, please go to the "Feature Requests" tracker on Sourceforge, or post a message on the "Suggest new search websites" thread of the forum.
You can also send an email to gwendal.lebihan.dev@gmail.com.

sect1.title: Reporting a bug
sect1.para: To report a bug, please go to the bugs tracker on Sourceforge. Please to try to be as precise as possible, and to attach console output if available.
You can also send an email to gwendal.lebihan.dev@gmail.com.
